items.content_html: A declarative JavaScript library for application development using cloud services.
items.title: aws-amplify/amplify-js: A declarative JavaScript library for application development using cloud services.

items.content_html: This repo showcases an Amplify/AWS/Angular app with Cognito authentication. Users can sign up, sign in, and sign out. The app includes a basic backend using Amplify's API and storage. Set up an AWS account and Cognito user pool, configure Amplify, and add your credentials to use. MIT License.
items.title: taevinbellamy88/AWS-Auth-App: This repo showcases an Amplify/AWS/Angular app with Cognito authentication. Users can sign up, sign in, and sign out. The app includes a basic backend using Amplify's API and storage. Set up an AWS account and Cognito user pool, configure Amplify, and add your credentials to use. MIT License.

items.content_html: This sample demonstrates the use of the Chime SDK React components together with an AppSync local resolver implemented with the "None" data source to provide GraphQL mutation driven subscription notifications without being backed by a persistent data store. It is a simple video chat React UI built and deployed using the AWS CDK.
items.title: aws-samples/amazon-chime-sdk-aws-appsync-sample: This sample demonstrates the use of the Chime SDK React components together with an AppSync local resolver implemented with the "None" data source to provide GraphQL mutation driven subscription notifications without being backed by a persistent data store. It is a simple video chat React UI built and deployed using the AWS CDK.
